  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_111058</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_111058</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Light interference and vector diagram for speeds of light and Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helles Störung und vektordiagramm für 
Lichtgeschwindigkeiten und Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagramme léger d'interférence et de vecteur 
pour des vitesses de lumière et de terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama claro da interferência e do vetor para 
velocidades de luz e de terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema chiaro di vettore e di interferenza per le
velocità di luce e di terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά παρέμβαση και διανυσματικό διάγραμμα για τις 
ταχύτητες του φωτός και της γης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama ligero de interferencia y del vector 
para las velocidades de la luz y de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows an experiment that demonstrates the formation of light interference patterns (a) and the vector diagram relating the speeds of light and Earth (b).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interference patterns</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vector diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt ein Experiment, das die 
Anordnung heller Interferenzmuster (a) und des vektordiagramms, 
welches die Lichtgeschwindigkeiten und Masse (b) in Verbindung steht 
zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre une expérience qui démontre
la formation des configurations d'interférence légères (a) et du 
diagramme de vecteur associant les vitesses de la lumière et de la 
terre (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra uma experiência que 
demonstre a formação dos testes padrões de interferência claros 
(a) e do diagrama do vetor que relaciona as velocidades de luz e de 
terra (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra un esperimento che dimostra 
la formazione dei modelli di interferenza chiari (a) e dello schema di
vettore che collega le velocità di luce e di terra (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει ένα πείραμα που 
καταδεικνύει το σχηματισμό των ελαφριών προτύπων παρέμβασης (α) 
και του διανυσματικού διαγράμματος που αφορά τις ταχύτητες του 
φωτός και της γης (β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra un experimento que 
demuestre la formación de los modelos de interferencia ligeros (a) y 
del diagrama del vector que relaciona las velocidades de la luz y de 
la tierra (b).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interferenzmuster</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vektordiagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">configurations d'interférence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vitesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">schema di vettore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
